channel.title: development on Tahoma2D
channel.description: Recent content in development on Tahoma2D

item.title: Tahoma2D 1.2 is out!
item.description: The latest version of Tahoma2D is now available! There are quite a number of new features, enhancements and lots of fixes. You can see what’s new here! Visit the Download page for links to download the latest release. If you have v1.1 or older, be sure to read how to upgrade from prior versions.

item.title: Tahoma2D 1.2 Beta is now available!
item.description: Tahoma2D 1.2 Beta includes a number of new features, enhancements and a lot of fixes. Details in the link below. A BIG thanks to all those involved from submitting ideas and changes to testing PRs! Please download the new beta and let us know what you think. You can try it out here! If you encounter any issues/bugs, please be sure to report it. Thanks!

item.title: Tahoma2D 1.1 is out!
item.description: Hi folks! Thanks so much for using Tahoma2D. I thrilled to announce that Tahoma2D 1.1 is now available. Here are some of the things you can expect in the new version: Over 100 bug fixes, tweaks and new features. Vanishing points and advanced straight line drawing on Vector levels. You can now snap straight lines to 15 degree intervals for greater precision. The vector brush can now draw behind, auto close and auto fill strokes.

item.title: Tahoma2D 1.1 Beta is now available!
item.description: Hi folks! Thanks so much for using Tahoma2D. I am proud to announce that version 1.1 is now in Beta. Here are some of the things you can expect in the new version: 91 bug fixes, tweaks and new features. Vanishing points and advanced straight line drawing on Vector levels. You can now snap straight lines to 15 degree intervals for greater precision. The vector brush can now draw behind, auto close and auto fill strokes.

item.title: Tahoma2D 1.0 is Out!
item.description: Tahoma2D has finally reached a place where I think it is ready for a 1.0 release. Throughout developement, a primary focus is on usability. I think that Tahoma2D has taken many great steps forward in that regard. There are also a bunch of new features to try- including features in OpenToonz that have been added since the 1.4 branch, as well as many features that are exclusive to Tahoma2D. You can try it out here!

item.title: Beta 3 is Out!
item.description: Beta 3 is out now. Beta 2 accidentally didn’t ship with DSLR support, that is back in Beta 3. There are also a few bug fixes. This is also the first beta to have Mac support. Thanks to @artisteacher for all her work in helping out. Download: Windows: Tahoma2D Beta 3 MacOS: Tahoma2D Beta 3 The notable new features: If you are using a Canon DSLR for Stop Motion, the test images now show metadata when you hover over them.

item.title: Try Beta 2
item.description: Beta 2 will launch in the next couple of days. There are a couple of new features and a handful of bug fixes since the last beta. The notable new features: If you are using a Canon DSLR for Stop Motion, the test images now show metadata when you hover over them. Eventually I will add the ability to click a button and apply a test shot’s metadata to the current camera settings.
